entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 6:16 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Condition: Heavy Rainshower
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 30 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy near Campbell River this morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm near Campbell River. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except 40 over exposed coastal sections. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:12 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:12 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning except flurries inland then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:12 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
